title: Overseas expansion off the menu at Domino's
text:
Maybe it was the “ultimate bacon cheeseburger” that did it. Everyone loves a pizza but some of the more exotic creations from Domino’s are enough to make you become a vegan. Burger sauce and gherkins anyone?

They can’t have gone down well in Switzerland, nor Iceland, Norway and Sweden, for that matter. Domino’s is pulling out of all four overseas markets after conducting a review of its loss-making international operations.

The review took just six weeks, which tells you how bad performance in those countries has been. And here’s the like-for-like sales figures for the last 13 weeks to confirm it: down 16.5pc in Norway; an 8.8pc decline in Iceland; and a 6.6pc fall in Switzerland. Only Sweden...
description: Maybe it was the “ultimate bacon cheeseburger” that did it.
